text: Has anyone here have any tips/ideas/articles regarding *page load speed optimization* besides images optimization?

• defer or async javascript files
• DNS prefetching
• Host your own fonts
Best to run it through lighthouse though and see where the bottlenecks are

I would suggest first running the page through a tool such as GTMetrix and looking at the waterfall. It will show you how fast your resources are loading. From here you can look for any resources that are slowing the loading of your page. (edited)
